OperationMethod.name: Identity Method 2D
OperationMethod.remarks: Method for use by a Coordinate Conversion for the identity transformation of two coordinates
OperationMethod.methodFormula: This coordinate converion shall be as specified by the equations: BaseX = DerivedX BaseY = DerivedY where DerivedX, DerivedY are position coordinates in the derived 2D CRS BaseX, BaseY are position coordinates in the 2D base CRS
